name: Brick Break
description:
Brick Break is a breakout clone with an interesting twist - something I call seizure mode!

Controls:

  • Press Space to turn on Autoplay (which is basically cheating but the game is way too difficult without it).
  • The paddle will follow the mouse's position on the screen.

Short Story: Brick break is one of the first Unity games I built while following along with Ben Tristem's Udemy Course - Learn to Code By Making Games. I wanted to showcase it here because it is the very first game I built with Unity and I have added some small touches that make it unique compared to the course version (like "seizure mode"). Unity makes it very easy to build for multiple platforms, so this game also has a mobile build in which the paddle follows the player's finger.

I've added download links for a desktop version and the android APK file.
